mapper.select: SELECT c.comSystemName , f.financeCode , f.comCode , f.comSystemNumeral , f.memberEmail , f.financeAmount , f.closingStatementCode FROM cffinance AS f INNER JOIN cfcomsystem AS c ON f.comSystemNumeral = c.comSystemNumeral WHERE f.comCode = #{comCode}
SELECT comSystemNumeral , comSystemName FROM cfcomsystem ORDER BY comSystemNumeral ASC
